        Constructor of the nature
        Parameters:
        driven - if the QCar is driven
        parkingTarget - if the QCar is a parking
        vertexTarget - if the QCar's vertices give points
        sideTarget - if the QCar's sides give points
        maxSideLenght - the QCar's max side length
        minArea - the QCar's min area
